name: River Meadow Manor

reviews.text: I stayed at the River Meadow Manor Country House whilst working recently in Pretoria. After my 11 hour flight from Heathrow, London, it was a most welcome sight. I was treated like a visiting dignitary, shown to my room and made to feel completely at ease. The staff were exemplary, nothing was too much for them and again I felt completely at ease and truly welcome.  On the night where they were fully booked (half-way through my stay), I dined in a lovely part of the House, away from the crowds of conference attendees and was served a delicious meal before being driven to the Pheasant Hill Country House nearby, where I stayed for the night.  The following day, it felt like going back to meet old friends. I can highly recommend this retreat from a long day at the office, where you can really unwind and recharge your batteries. My only complaint? I didn't stay there long enough but that's not River Meadow Manor's fault; it's my own stud fault!
reviews.title: Serene Irene River Meadow Manor

description: Tucked away in tranquil Irene amid lush green pastures and old oak trees lies a sparkling gem. River Meadow Manor exudes country-style sophistication in a setting rich with historical significance. Ideally located in Irene between Johannesburg and Pretoria, River Meadow Manor is easily accessible from both city centres; and is just 20 minutes from OR Tambo International Airport. A fully-equipped conference venue offers professional conference facilities away from the distractions of the city; and versatile function rooms can be transformed into the perfect function venue or wedding venue. Accommodation is stylish and elegant, ensuring utmost comfort for the most discerning guest; and exquisite cuisine translates into fine dining at its best.
